page.title: 14EDUCATION 2
page.content: After the age of 16 the young people of this area can either contine into further education or find employment, which is very difficult at this time. This is done by staying on into the sixth form of their secondary school or by going onto the North Notts College of Further Education in Worksop,to follow courses of study leading to A levels or other qualifications. They then start work or go onto University,Polytechnic College or Teacher Training College. The private sector is well catered for by the nearby Worksop College and Trent College. Ample provision is made locally in both Retford and Worksop for any mildly or seriously handicapped children.
